name: Slim Fit Easy-iron Shirt
description: Slim-fit shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic button placket, and darts and a yoke at back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at cuffs and a sleeve placket with link button. Gently rounded hem.

name: Relaxed Fit Short-sleeved Linen-blend Shirt
description: Relaxed-fit, short-sleeved shirt in an airy cotton and linen blend. Turn-down collar, buttons without placket, open chest pocket, and yoke at back. Straight-cut hem with slit at sides. Cotton and linen blends combine the softness of cotton with the sturdiness of linen, creating a beautiful, textured fabric that is breathable and perfectly draped.

name: Oversized Fit Resort Shirt
description: Disney100 x H&M. In celebration of Disney's 100th anniversary, artist and former professional snowboarder Trevor Andrew has created this streetwear-inspired collection featuring new takes on some of the studio's most beloved characters. Oversized shirt in woven viscose fabric with a pattern. Resort collar, buttons without placket, yoke at back, and short sleeves. Straight-cut hem with slit at sides.

name: Regular Fit Connon Shirt
description: Short-sleeved shirt in woven cotton fabric with a turn-down collar. Classic button placket, yoke at back, and a chest pocket. Rounded hem. Regular Fit – classic fit with good room for movement and gently shaped waist for a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

name: Muscle Fit Band-collar Shirt
description: Shirt in cotton poplin with stretch. Band collar, classic button placket, and yoke at back with darts. Long sleeves and cuffs with adjustable buttoning, sleeve placket, and link button. Rounded hem. Muscle Fit - designed to showcase physique. Narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves for a flattering silhouette.
